data.name: Database_CreateScript
data.value: USE [HumanResource] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Activity] Script Date: 24.09.2019 13:50:35 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Activity]( [ActivityID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [EmployeeId] [int] NOT NULL, [ActivityName] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [ActivityDescription] [nvarchar](500) NULL, [ActivityDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [ActivityCapacity] [int] NOT NULL, [ActivityStatus] [bit] NOT NULL, [ActivityIsDeleted] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Activity] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ActivityID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[ActivityBranch] Script Date: 24.09.2019 13:50:36 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ActivityBranch]( [ActivityId] [int] NOT NULL, [BranchId] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_ActivityBranch] PRIMARY [nvarchar](50) NULL, [EducationTrainerSurname] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [EducationTrainerTelephone] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [EducationsNotes] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [EducationIsMandatory] [bit] NOT NULL, [EducationStatus] [bit] NOT NULL, [EducationIsDeleted] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Education] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [EducationID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[EducationEmployee] Script Date: 24.09.2019 13:50:36 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[EducationEmployee]( [EmployeeId] [int] NOT NULL, [EducationId] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_EducationEmployee] [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Employee] Script Date: 24.09.2019 13:50:36 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Employee]( [EmployeeId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [IncapacityReportId] [int] NOT NULL, [EmployeeCode] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [EmployeeUsername] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [EmployeePassword] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [EmployeeTitle] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [EmployeeName] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeSurname] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeBirthdate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeEmail] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeCompanyMail] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeBirthplace] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeTelephone1] [nvarchar](11) NOT NULL, [EmployeeTelephone2] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [EmployeeIsSmoke] [bit] NOT NULL, [EmployeeBloodGroup] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeTc] [nvarchar](11) NOT NULL, [EmployeeMarialStatus] [bit] NOT NULL, [EmployeeGender] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL, [EmployeeCountry] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeCity] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeStreet] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeBuildNo] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeePostcode] [nvarchar](10) NULL, [EmployeeMilitaryDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeMilitaryStatus] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL, [EmployeeBankName] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeIban] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeBankCode] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeIsDrivingLicense] [bit] NOT NULL, [EmployeeDrivingLicenseName] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeImagePath] [nvarchar](250) NULL, [EmployeeRegisteredDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeWifeNameSurname] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [EmployeeWifeBirthdate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeWifeTelephone] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [EmployeeWifeTCKN] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [EmployeeSSKFirstBeginDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeWorkBeginDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeWorkOutDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [EmployeeLanguage1] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeLanguage2] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeLanguage3] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [EmployeeReferenceNameSurname] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [EmployeeReferenceNotes] [nvarchar](500) NULL, [EmployeeReferenceTelephone] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [EmployeeChildrenCount] [int] NOT NULL, [EmployeeGraduationSchool] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [EmployeeGraduationDepartment] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [EmployeeGraduationScore] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [EmployeeManager] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [EmployeeDisabilitySituation] [bit] NOT NULL, [EmployeeSGKNumber] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [EmployeeNotes] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [EmployeeStatus] [bit] NOT NULL, [EmployeeIsDeleted] [bit] NOT NULL, [AdvertisementID] [int] NULL, [DepartmentId] [int] NULL, [BranchId] [int] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Employee] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [EmployeeId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[EmployeeMessage] Script Date: 24.09.2019 13:50:36 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[EmployeeMessage]( [PatientNameSurname] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [RegistrationNumber] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Diploma] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [PatentNumber] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [IncapacityReportIsDeleted] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_IncapacityReport] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [IncapacityReportId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[JobApplication] Script Date: 24.09.2019 13:50:36 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE [WifeJobAddress] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [JobPhone] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [HomePhone] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Phone] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Nationality] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [MilitaryStatus] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [IsDrivingLicense] [bit] NOT NULL, [LicenseClass] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [IsCriminalRecord] [bit] NOT NULL, [LicenseDate] [datetime2](7) NOT NULL, [SchoolName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SchoolCity] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SchoolDegree] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [ExpectedSalary] [float] NOT NULL, [JobApplicationStatus] [bit] NOT NULL, [JobApplicationIsDeleted] [bit] NOT NULL,
